text: (Aey Muhammad)!Inse kaho ke aao main tumhein sunaoon tumhare Rubb ne tumpar kya pabandiyan aayad ki hain : yeh ke uske saath kisi ko shareek na karo, aur walidain (Maa Baap) ke saath neik sulook karo, aur apni aulad ko muflisi ke darr se qatal na karo, hum tumhein bhi rizq dete hain aur unko bhi denge, aur besharmi ki baaton ke qareeb bhi na jao, khwah woh khuli hon ya chupi. Aur kisi jaan ko jisey Allah ne mohtaram thehraya hai halaak na karo magar haqq ke saath. Yeh baatein hain jinki hidayat usne tumhein ki hai, shayad ke tum samajh boojh se kaam lo
